alert.note: Alert for Buttonwillow - Lost Hills - I5; Caruthers - San Joaquin - Selma; Delano-Wasco-Shafter; Fresno-Clovis; Hanford - Corcoran - Lemoore; Los Banos - Dos Palos; Merced - Madera - Mendota; Visalia - Porterville - Reedley; West Side of Fresno and Kings Counties (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued January 06 at 12:26AM PST until January 06 at 10:00AM PST by NWS Hanford
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM PST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Visibility one quarter mile or less in dense fog. * WHERE...Los Banos -Dos Palos, Merced -Madera -Mendota, West Side of Fresno and Kings Counties, Caruthers -San Joaquin - Selma, Fresno-Clovis, Buttonwillow -Lost Hills -I5, Delano- Wasco-Shafter, Hanford -Corcoran -Lemoore and Visalia - Porterville -Reedley. * WHEN...Until 10 AM PST this morning. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.
